title: TSMC 2nm Production Schedule Accelerated
content: Sources indicate TSMC is pulling forward N2 risk production to Q2 2025 due to high demand from Apple and NVIDIA.

title: Intel Foundry Services Secures Major Defense Contract
content: Intel has been awarded a $3B contract by the DoD to secure domestic chip supply using the 18A process.

title: NVIDIA H200 Supply Chain Constraints Easing
content: CoWoS capacity expansion at TSMC is finally alleviating H200 shortages, with lead times dropping to 12 weeks.
